title: Pixel 3 is not working
content:
Since yesterday the phone is not working. 
Day before it started to turn off randomly and in a few hours it stops turning on. The phone was fully charged and now it is not react to charge plugged in. 
So i'm not able to nor to turn the phone or charge it.  
The Support Chat and Phone Chat is offline all the time so please call me back and we decide how to proceed.
